subject: Re: Order #SSN2030 confirmed
description_text:
Hi....please let me know if I bought your best pedals....do I need any
accessories? I'm a bit confused by the products so I just selected the most
expensive option. I only need a throttle and brake pedal. Do I need any
springs or dampener or does it come with these?

Thanks

Darryn

conversations.body_text: Please also advise if the shipping option is with a door to door courier?

Hi Darryn Lahner,  ​PlusX is our latest pedal model, and both the spring and hydraulic components are included by default—no need to purchase them separately. If you would like to add the VAM Pro vibration motor, it can be purchased individually. Delivery is door-to-door, so you can rest assured.

Thats great thank you! I dont need a vibration motor just yet.

Thanks again!

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 9:32 AM service@simsonn.com
I think I might need a clutch...can I still add to my order?
Sorry, your package has already been shipped and we are no longer able to modify your order for you.
Ok, thank you. That was fast...appreciate it.
